title: Snippets Index
content:
# Snippets

This category contains small, focused code pieces.

## What belongs here

- One-liners and short functions
- Useful regex patterns
- Shell commands
- Quick solutions to common problems
- Copy-paste ready code blocks

## Adding new snippets

Create a new `.md` file in this directory following the document template in AGENTS.md.

title: Code wiki overview
content: Creating this basic code wiki as a way to search through and understand all of the apps I've been developing in this repo, and also to create a general meta way to view setups like this for possible later creation for writers I'm giving tech services to or similar clients.
